fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
EU efforts to tackle HIV AIDS

goals__remit: We are a consultancy and think tank focused on tackling the greatest challenges of the 21st Century.  Areas of work include nutrition, health, and the social impact of artificial intelligence.
